TextLibrary.Text: Khrona
So you are the one who slew Dugog. Khalkus has told me all about you.
So you are the one who slew Dugog. Khalkus has told me all about you.
So you are the one who slew Dugog. Khalkus has told me all about you.
So you are the one who slew Dugog. Khalkus has told me all about you.
Really? Did he stop to take a breath?
Really? Did he stop to take a breath?

Khalkus? Not likely. As leader of the Merchant Guild, I extend our thanks to you.

Wait... are you a FEMALE Dwarf?
Wait... are you a FEMALE Dwarf?
Wait... are you a FEMALE Dwarf?
Wait... are you a FEMALE Dwarf?
Humans! You can never tell the difference!
Humans! You can never tell the difference!

Humans! You can never tell the difference!
Can Dwarves tell the difference?
Can Dwarves tell the difference?
Can Dwarves tell the difference?
Can Dwarves tell the difference?
Of course we can! It would be a little embarrassing if we couldn't, don't you think?
Of course we can! It would be a little embarrassing if we couldn't, don't you think?

Of course we can! It would be a little embarrassing if we couldn't, don't you think?

Now, to the business at hand. With the death of Dugog, the Orc tribes in the area are starting to fight amongst themselves. I am hoping that since you were strong enough to defeat Dugog, that you could knock some Orc heads together in some of the villages and quiet them down.

I'll see what I can do.
